TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi Canvas extends System.Windows.Controls.Panel

summary.span: 定義一個區域，您可以在其中使用與 區域相對的座標，明確地放置子項目。

span.span: Defines an area within which you can explicitly position child elements by using coordinates that are relative to the area.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A包含的集合中的物件屬性。A contains a collection of objects, which are in the property. 是唯一具有沒有固有的配置特性的面板項目。 is the only panel element that has no inherent layout characteristics. A有預設值和屬性為零，除非它是元素的子系是自動調整大小及其子項目。A has default and properties of zero, unless it is the child of an element that automatically sizes its child elements. 子項目的會永遠不會調整大小，它們都只位於其指定的座標。Child elements of a are never resized, they are just positioned at their designated coordinates. 這提供了彈性的固有的調整大小條件約束或對齊的情況下不需要或不想。This provides flexibility for situations in which inherent sizing constraints or alignment are not needed or wanted. 您想要設定自動調整大小和對齊的子內容的情況下，通常最好是使用項目。For cases in which you want child content to be automatically resized and aligned, it is usually best to use a element. 屬性會決定共用相同的座標空間的子元素出現的順序。The property determines the order in which child elements that share the same coordinate space appear. 較高一個子系項目的值，指出這個項目會出現另一個子系項目具有較低的值之上。A higher value for one child element indicates that this element will appear above another child element that has a lower value. 如果您指定的附加屬性，它們或是優先於或屬性。If you specify them, the attached properties or take priority over the or properties. 子項目的一定會給您想要的完整大小。Child elements of a are always given the full size that they desire. 如此一來，垂直對齊和水平對齊方式不影響內。As a result, vertical alignment and horizontal alignment have no effect inside a . 是您可以使用絕對位置的子內容的最上層的版面配置控制項。 is a top-level layout control that you can use for absolute positioning of child content. 如需繪製和繪圖，方法，您可以使用筆刷，並不需要使用。For painting and drawing, you use brushes and do not have to use a . 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 使用純色和漸層概觀繪製](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/painting-with-solid-colors-and-gradients-overview.md)。For more information, see [Painting with Solid Colors and Gradients Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/painting-with-solid-colors-and-gradients-overview.md). 根據預設，面板項目不會接收焦點。By default, panel elements do not receive focus. 若要有興趣接收焦點的面板項目，設定屬性設`true`。To compel a panel element to receive focus, set the property to `true`. ## Examples 下列範例會產生三個項目，每個項目 100 像素。The following example produces three elements, each element 100 pixels. 第一個為紅色，其左上角 (*x，y*) 位置指定為 （0，0）。The first is red, and its upper-left (*x, y*) position is specified as (0, 0). 第二個為綠色，以及其左上角位置是 （100，100），這是正下方和右邊的第一個方塊中。The second is green, and its upper-left position is (100, 100), which is just below, and to the right of, the first square. 第三個是藍色，以及其左上角位置是 （50，50）。The third is blue, and its upper-left position is (50, 50). 因此，第三個涵蓋第一個的右下方象限和第二個左上象限。Hence, the third covers the lower-right quadrant of the first and the upper-left quadrant of the second. 因為第三個版面最後，它似乎是另外兩個方形上方，重疊部分也就是假設的第三個色彩。Because the third is laid out last, it appears to be on top of the other two squares—that is, the overlapping portions assume the color of the third . [!code-csharp[CanvasOvwSample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CanvasOvwSample/CSharp/Canvas_Ovw_Sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[CanvasOvwSample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CanvasOvwSample/VisualBasic/canvas_vb.vb#1)] [!code-xaml[CanvasOvwSample#1](~/samples/snippets/xaml/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CanvasOvwSample/XAML/default.xaml#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值表示項目底端與其父代 底端之間的距離。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that represents the distance between the bottom of an element and the bottom of its parent .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 位移的子項目不會影響父代的大小。The offset of a child element does not affect the size of a parent . 如果您指定的附加屬性，它們或是優先於或屬性。If you specify them, the attached properties or take priority over the or properties. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|
